channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: What has changed with immigration under Trump and what is still playing out?
item.description: President Donald Trump has signed 10 executive orders on immigration and issued a slew of edicts to carry out promises of mass deportations and border security.

item.title: Immigration officers are operating with a new sense of mission. Now, ‘nobody gets a free pass’
Evacuated residents wait hours for a chance to return to burned LA neighborhoods
